import React from 'react'
import ReactDOM from 'react-dom/client'
import App from './App'
import './index.css'

ReactDOM.createRoot(document.getElementById('root')).render(
  <React.StrictMode>
    <App />
  </React.StrictMode>,
)

import React from 'react' const About = () => { return (

About Me

I am a passionate MERN stack developer with extensive experience in building modern web applications. My journey in web development started 5 years ago, and I have been creating robust and scalable solutions ever since.

I specialize in creating full-stack applications using MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js. My focus is on writing clean, maintainable code and delivering exceptional user experiences.

) } export default About
